thread.section_title: The Inn At The Spanish Steps - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Inn at the Spanish Steps rocks!
thread.title_full: Inn at the Spanish Steps rocks! - Review of The Inn At The Spanish Steps, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Adrian G
title: Inn at the Spanish Steps rocks!
text: My wife and I wanted to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary and having a great place to rest and wake up, at a great location and with plenty of ambience was important and TripAdvisor didn't let us down! It's a quaint place and the staff was fantastic from the front desk to bellmen! Very helpful and always ready with a correct answer! We felt welcomed and appreciated!
